title: California chef 'drugged and raped' female member of the military
text:
Darryl Lee Matanane, 55, is accused of serving a woman a spiked alcoholic drink at Bistro Saint Germain in Seal Beach, where he worked in February 2018

A former chef has been charged with drugging and raping a military servicewoman after she dined at the restaurant where he worked.

Darryl Lee Matanane, 55, is accused of serving the unidentified woman a spiked alcoholic drink at Bistro Saint Germain in Seal Beach, California, while he was working in February 2018.

She said she woke up at a stranger's apartment with no recollection of how she got there and claimed to have been sexually assaulted.

Matanane pleaded not guilty last week to six felony counts of rape by use of drugs, rape of an unconscious person, sodomy of an unconscious person, sodomy by anesthesia or a controlled substance, sexual penetration of an unconscious victim and sexual penetration by intoxicating or controlled substance.

The former chef was initially arrested in February 2018 but was released after requesting further investigation.

After a deeper investigation a warrant was issued for his arrest more than a year later.

The woman, who is a member of the military, said she woke up at a strangers apartment and was sexually assaulted after she dined at the Bistro Saint Germain

He was taken into custody on August 30, 2019 in Midland, Texas, and extradited to Orange County, California, on September 13.

Matanane is currently being held at the Orange County Jail on $1million bail.

'The Seal Beach Police Department and the Orange County District Attorney's Office worked diligently to ensure that this perpetrator will be held accountable,' said Orange County District Attorney Todd Spitzer in a statement.

'I want to commend prosecutors from the Orange County District Attorney's Office and the Seal Beach Police Investigators for diligently pursuing justice for the victim,' Seal Beach Police Chief Joe Miller added.

Deputy District Attorney Ann Fawaz of the Sexual Assault Unit is prosecuting this case.
description: Darryl Lee Matanane, 55, is accused of serving a woman a spiked alcoholic drink at Bistro Saint Germain in Seal Beach, where he worked in February 2018.
